abstract: After months of anticipation, Facebook is now in the final stage of completing its takeover of Instagram, the popular photo-sharing application.
snippet: After months of anticipation, Facebook is now in the final stage of completing its takeover of Instagram, the popular photo-sharing application.
lead_paragraph: After months of anticipation, Facebook is now closer to completing its takeover of Instagram, the popular photo-sharing application.

headline.main: F.T.C. Ends Investigation on Facebook’s Instagram Deal
